venue.address_2: across from the State Police Station
venue.name: Revere Beach

item.description:
No-shows (you know who you are!) will longer be tolerated as demands are high and spaces are limited. Please DON'T RSVP YES unless you are absolutely sure you can make it.

This will be an "intermediate and up" level meetup. It will be outdoors at Revere beach.

Intermediate level means: Players with firm understanding of game strategy. Should have a good grasp of skills (passing, setting, hitting) and be able to move around to cover areas of the court.

Hope to ee you tomorrow.

Terri
item.name: Intermediate Level at Revere beach
